reviewText: Great movie for the whole family!
This is a nice little movie, the kind you watch on Lifetime or Hallmark.  Pleasant to watch and leaves a nice glow.
Great movie of the little known misfortune the Wayne Gretzky dealt with during his NHL career.
great movie it helps to show what people are going threw with a brain injury it shows the ups and downs  not only for the patient but for the family
Wonderful, well acted story of the Gretzky families struggle to help Walter Gretzky recover from a life altering stroke. It is nice to have a DVD the whole family can sit down and watch together.

Great Movie!!!Well acted; true story;Great family movie. True stories that both entertain and inspire you are very hard to find in this world today. Nice to see a story were bad behavior is not glorified. People need to know today that something good can come out of something that we would call bad!!!!Enjoy!!!!
